author: mattmann
msg: - take out user-specific properties: these should be put in a build.properties file in the user $HOME dir

author: bfoster
msg: - fixed the bugs in the last implementation of it
- made protocol extension writing for paging less complicated
- download and paging tasks have been given to ProtocolHandler
- Paging has been added to HttpClient
- SftpClient (which uses J2SSH has not been update with paging yet -- will wait until bug in library has been located and fixed)
DirStruct was modified so it does not have to handle creating files with the download extension -- this was given to ProtocolHandler

author: mattmann
msg: - catch and log exception in execute method

author: bfoster
msg: Paging was added to the Crawler
- FtpClient and SftpClient_jsch have been update to handle paged crawling (presently HttpClient and SftpClient are not compatible with the new Crawler -- they will be updated at a later time).
